description:
A Box represents a box in the 3D world.

In Particubes, a Box is always aligned with the world coordinate system.

constructors.description: Creates a Number3 with values x, y and z.

properties.name: Min
properties.description: Box corner coordinates with smaller X,Y,Z components.

properties.name: Max
properties.description: Box corner coordinates with bigger X,Y,Z components.
